item.title: Court clerk who helped with Alex Murdaugh's trial pleads guilty to showing sealed exhibits
item.description: Former South Carolina court clerk Becky Hill has pleaded guilty to showing sealed court exhibits to a photographer and lying about it in court

item.title: Washington's Mayor Bowser says the city's police chief, Pamela Smith, is stepping down
item.description: Washington D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser says the city's police chief, Pamela Smith, is stepping down

item.title: Mamdani tells immigrant New Yorkers about their right not to comply with ICE
item.description: The New York City mayor-elect posted a video explaining immigrants' right.

item.title: Redistricting in Indiana faces ultimate test in state Senate
item.description: Indiana state senators are gathering in Indianapolis to finally weigh in on mid-cycle redistricting

item.title: A second flight of Iranian deportees, carrying 55, has left the US, Iran says
item.description: Iranian officials say a second flight carrying deported Iranians has left the United States
